title: Engaging with India’s Top Financial Leaders at Harvard
summary: Attended a prestigious conference at Harvard, engaging with top Indian financial experts and global students from MIT, Boston University, and more, gaining insights into advanced financial strategies.
fullDetails: Direct Engagement: Attended a conference at Harvard University where I interacted with leading Indian financial experts such as Ashish Chauhan, Devanshu G., Anurag Sinha, Nirmal Jain, Madhusudanan R., Abhishant Pant, Ashutosh Goyal, Dr. Ritesh Malik, and Abhijit Roy.
Global Networking: Connected with vibrant students from Harvard, MIT, Boston University, Northeastern, and Babson—underscoring the value of global collaboration and fresh perspectives in finance.
Key Insights: Gained invaluable firsthand insights into advanced financial strategies that have deepened my comprehension of financial markets and broadened my professional horizons.

title: 27th Annual Harvard Africa Conference: Beyond Borders
summary: Explored Africa’s evolving financial landscape at Harvard’s Africa Conference, broadening my perspective on global investment and economic strategies.
fullDetails: Inclusive Exploration: Participated in a session on “Pan-African Financial Systems” at Harvard, which offered a comprehensive look into Africa’s dynamic financial landscape.

Broadened Perspectives: Despite not being African, the inclusive environment allowed me to enhance my approach to global finance and investment decision-making, reinforcing the interconnected nature of world markets.
Strategic Growth: These insights have been instrumental in cultivating a holistic view of finance, driving my passion for international financial markets.

title: Families in Business Conference 2024, Cornell Tech
summary: Participated in the 10th-anniversary celebration of the Families in Business Conference at Cornell Tech, connecting with industry professionals and discussing family enterprise innovations.
fullDetails: Insightful Panels: Attended the 10th-anniversary celebration at Cornell Tech on Roosevelt Island, featuring dynamic panels and speakers discussing the unique challenges and opportunities in family businesses.
Professional Connection: Engaged with industry professionals, gaining fresh perspectives that will influence my future strategic endeavors.
Celebratory Impact: Contributed to and celebrated a milestone event that underscored innovation in family-owned enterprises.

title: Cornell Entrepreneurship Summit 2024
date: Verizon Executive Education Center, Cornell Tech | 2024
summary: Joined visionaries, entrepreneurs, and finance professionals at Cornell’s Entrepreneurship Summit to explore cutting-edge business innovations and startup ecosystems.
fullDetails: Entrepreneurial Ecosystem: Participated in an inspiring summit at the Verizon Executive Education Center, where visionaries, entrepreneurs, and thought leaders explored innovation and transformative business strategies.
Valuable Insights: Connected with the Cornell community and beyond, gaining ideas and insights that fuel my passion for merging technology with finance.
Changemaker Vibes: Proud to be part of a vibrant ecosystem dedicated to entrepreneurial growth and innovation.

title: Conference at Columbia University
summary: Attended expert-led discussions at Columbia University featuring India's Finance Minister and Cornell finance professors, gaining deep insights into global economic trends.
fullDetails: High-Caliber Interactions: Attended sessions featuring notable leaders such as Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman and Cornell alum Finance Professor Amiyatosh Purnanandam.
Deepened Knowledge: Expanded my understanding of domestic economic trends and the broader implications for global finance, enriching my strategic approach.

title: Conference at CSIS, Washington, D.C.
summary: Attended high-profile discussions on India's economic policies, global financial stability, and monetary strategies with renowned experts including India's Chief Economic Advisor and IMF Chief Economist.
fullDetails: Engaged with India's Chief Economic Advisor, V. Anantha Nageswaran; former RBI Deputy Governor, Viral Acharya; and IMF Chief Economist, Marina Mendes Tavares.
Explored global economic trends, inflation control policies, and central banking strategies.
Discussed financial regulations, risk mitigation, and economic resilience in volatile markets.

title: Core Member, MAAN Welfare Foundation
summary: Serving as a core member of MAAN Welfare Foundation, leading initiatives to enhance farmer profitability, provide training, and establish strategic partnerships for impact.
fullDetails: Program Development: Developed and implemented programs that significantly improved the profitability and well-being of regional farmers.
Training & Education: Designed and delivered training sessions on crop management, marketing, financial management, and technology adoption, empowering local communities.
Advocacy & Outreach: Acted as a spokesperson for the foundation, effectively communicating its mission to the public, donors, and government officials.
Impact Reporting: Prepared detailed reports and presentations for stakeholders, highlighting achievements, challenges, and future opportunities.
Partnership Management: Established and maintained strong partnerships with donors, local organizations, and government agencies to maximize the foundation’s impact.
